title: Ticket #1868: remote submission authentication
description:
When performing a remote submission(Win[exec]->Linux[schedd]), if there are generic configs which are applied which inadvertently have duplicate AUTH methods, in the example below it's FS, then the tools will fail even if there are correctly matching AUTH methods such as CLAIMTOBE 

$ condor_submit -remote <my_sched> wait.sub
Submitting job(s)
ERROR: Failed to connect to queue manager <my_schedd>
AUTHENTICATE:1003:Failure.  Unsupported method: 4
creator: tstclair
